what: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: empty column one whose values NA "".

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
code: library('data.table') d = data.table(w = 3:4, x = c('', 'foo'), y = c(NA, NA), z = c(NA, '')) drop_empties(d) #>    w   x #> 1: 3     #> 2: 4 foo

what: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
code: scto_auth(   auth_file = NULL,   servername = NULL,   username = NULL,   password = NULL )

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: auth_file String indicating path file containing authorization information, servername first line, username second, password third. auth_file NULL, arguments ignored. auth_file NULL, arguments must provided. servername String indicating name SurveyCTO server. username String indicating username SurveyCTO account. password String indicating password SurveyCTO account.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
code: if (FALSE) { # preferred approach, avoids storing any credentials in code auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt')  # alternate approach auth = scto_auth('my_server', 'my_user', 'my_pw', auth_file = NULL) }

what: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_pull
title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_pull
text: function pulls data SurveyCTO using API.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_pull
code: scto_pull(   auth,   id,   type = c("dataset", "form"),   start_date = 0L,   drop_empty_cols = TRUE,   refresh = FALSE,   cache_dir = "scto_data" )

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_pull
text: auth scto_auth() object. id String indicating ID dataset form fetch. type String indicating type SurveyCTO data. start_date Date, string coercible date, integer (corresponding days since 1970-01-01) indicating earliest date fetch data. drop_empty_cols Logical indicating whether drop columns contain NA empty string. refresh Logical indicating whether fetch fresh data using API attempt load locally cached data. cache_dir String indicating path directory cache data.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_pull
Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_pull
Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_push
text: function uploads csv file SurveyCTO using web POSTs GETs replace data existing Server Dataset.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_push
Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_push
text: auth scto_auth() object. data data.frame upload. dataset_id String indicating existing dataset ID server. dataset_title String indicating title dataset.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_push
Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_push
code: if (FALSE) { auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') res = scto_push(auth, data, 'my_dataset', 'My Dataset') }
